scenario_text.value: Shit, they showed up after all...
Whew, we beat them somehow!
So, you all right, Takuma?!
Yeah. Thanks, guys.
What was that, Shuuji?
I couldn’t say... I was shocked myself.

She just attacked us when she first appeared
at the school. Didn’t use tactics like that.

Hmph, it’s like they saw how well we banded
together, and aimed for a chink in our armor.

Yo, we can’t make light of this! If a better
fake shows up next time, we’re in trouble...
Yeah, that’d be bad...

More importantly, we’d better regroup and
resume the search. Stay on guard, everyone.

Hold on, Shuuji. The fog is thickening. We
better stick together.
Yes, I guess you’re right, it’s just...

If we stick together, the fog’ll grab us all
before we even find the shrine.

But if they attack us while we’re separated,
searching will be the least of our problems.

(Should we prioritize our safety? Or the
search for the shrine?)
(What makes more sense?)
Let’s stick together.
Searching comes first.
Try the buddy system?

Let’s stick together. Nothing comes before
our safety.

But... If the Kenzoku are here, doesn’t that
mean the enemy’s beat us to the punch?

Yeah! We gotta hurry up, even if that means
taking a few risks!

No way! What’s the point in forcing things if
it ends with all of us vanishing?!
Hey, won’t we be safe if we pair up?
Oh, that’s a good idea!

The search comes first. A little danger isn’t
as important as finding the shrine.

He’s right. If we avoid pointless fights and
run when we can, it should work out...
B-but still...

I’m against it. I ain’t putting Miu in any
more danger than I gotta.

It’s better to stick with someone else.
Imagine if someone gets attacked flying solo.

But if we waste time here, the enemy’s gonna
beat us to the punch, right?
Hey, won’t we be safe if we pair up?
Oh, that’s a good idea!
Why don’t we try the buddy system?

Ohh that’s a good idea! We can work together
if we stick with someone else!
Yeah, that’ll work!
Hmm... Yeah, that should be fine.
Right, no objections here.
In that case, how do we split up?
Whatever works, right? I’ll go with Miu.
Hold up! Don’t decide on your own!
Then I’ll go with Aoi!
Okay, let’s do this, Saki.
Hmm... Then Ryo and I will pair up.
Works for me.

That means it’s you and me in the picked last
pair, Takuma! What a dream team!
You dream about getting picked last?
